verses.verse: <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7971>send<s%> My <S%H4397>messenger,<s%> and he will <S%H6437>clear<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me. And the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H1245>seek,<s%> will <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to His <S%H1964>temple;<s%> and the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2655>delight,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> He is <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"But <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H3557>endure<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of His <S%H935>coming<s%>? And <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5975>stand<s%> when He <S%H7200>appears<s%>? For He is like a refiner's <S%H784>fire<s%> and like fullers' <S%H1287>soap.<s%>

"And He will <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H6884>smelter<s%> and <S%H2891>purifier<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and He will <S%H2891>purify<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> and <S%H2212>refine<s%> them like <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> so that they may <S%H5066>present<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4503>offerings<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

"Then the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%> and as in <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

"Then I will <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you for <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and I will be a <S%H4116>swift<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against the <S%H3784>sorcerers<s%> and against the <S%H5003>adulterers<s%> and against those who <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and against those who <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H7916>wage<s%> <S%H7916>earner<s%> in his <S%H7939>wages,<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> and those who <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> and do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> Me," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
"For I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not <S%H8132>change;<s%> therefore you, O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> are not <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

"From the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your fathers you have <S%H1>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from My <S%H5493>statutes,<s%> and have not <S%H2706>kept<s%> [them.] <S%H8104>Return<s%> to Me, and I will <S%H7725>return<s%> to you," <S%H7725>says<s%> the <S%H559>Lord<s%> of <S%H3068>hosts.<s%> "But you <S%H6635>say,<s%> <S%H559>'How<s%> shall we <S%H4100>return<s%>?'

"Will a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6906>rob<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? <S%H3588>Yet<s%> you are <S%H6906>robbing<s%> Me! But you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'How<s%> have we <S%H6906>robbed<s%> Thee?' In <S%H4643>tithes<s%> and <S%H8641>offerings.<s%>
"You are <S%H779>cursed<s%> with a <S%H3994>curse,<s%> for you are <S%H6906>robbing<s%> Me, the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> [of you]!

<S%H935>"Bring<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4643>tithe<s%> into the <S%H214>storehouse,<s%> so that there may be <S%H2964>food<s%> in My <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H974>test<s%> Me <S%H4994>now<s%> in <S%H2088>this,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H518>"if<s%> I will not <S%H6605>open<s%> for you the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H9553>pour<s%> out for you a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> it <S%H1097>overflows.<s%> <S%H1767><s%>

"Then I will <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> the <S%H398>devourer<s%> for you, so that it may not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will your <S%H1612>vine<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7921>cast<s%> [its grapes]," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H833>call<s%> you <S%H833>blessed,<s%> for you shall be a <S%H2656>delightful<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"Your <S%H1697>words<s%> have <S%H2388>been<s%> <S%H2388>arrogant<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> have we <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Thee?'

"You have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it that we have <S%H8104>kept<s%> His <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and that we have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H6941>mourning<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>?

'So <S%H6258>now<s%> we <S%H833>call<s%> the <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> <S%H833>blessed;<s%> not <S%H1571>only<s%> are the <S%H6213>doers<s%> of <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> up, but they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H974>test<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H4422>escape.<s%>' "

<S%H227>Then<s%> those who <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7181>gave<s%> <S%H7181>attention<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] and a <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him for those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and who <S%H2803>esteem<s%> His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"And they will be Mine," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6213>prepare<s%> [My] own <S%H5459>possession,<s%> and I will <S%H2550>spare<s%> them as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2550>spares<s%> his own <S%H1121>son<s%> who <S%H5647>serves<s%> him."

So you will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>distinguish<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> one who <S%H5647>serves<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and one <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him.
